name: Esophaguys
description:
You and your friends are the Esophaguys, a group of old folks with a peculiar trait - elastic necks. Together, by using your unique anatomy, you may stretch, bite, and swing your way around the world.     Features:
  • 1 - 4 player local multiplayer mayhem
  •  Stretchy swinging neck fun
  •  Co-op and competitive game modes
  •  Original jews-harp soundtrack
    Team Suraj Sirohi - Art
Peyton Blake - Art & Audio & Design
Jeremy Leung - Level Design
Matthew Burchat - Level Design & Documentation
Gabriel Holtschlag- Programming & Design     Keep up with development Visit the official website Esophaguys.com
Follow us on Twitter
Follow our itch.io account  :)
